plot outline: Prabhakar, a postman by profession lives with his family in a village in Konkan. The most important thing in Prabhakar's life is his adorable daughter Pari. Prabhakar is a simple person with no dreams but a weird nature. He is very honest with his duty but has got a strange habit. This strange habit of his not only creates chaos in his life as well as that of others, but also puts their lives in danger. Will Prabhakar manage to rectify his mistake, or people will have to sacrifice their lives for his mistake?
title: Murder Mestri
plot: Prabhakar, a postman by profession lives with his family in a village in Konkan. The most important thing in Prabhakar's life is his adorable daughter Pari. Prabhakar is a simple person with no dreams but a weird nature. He is very honest with his duty but has got a strange habit. This strange habit of his not only creates chaos in his life as well as that of others, but also puts their lives in danger. Will Prabhakar manage to rectify his mistake, or people will have to sacrifice their lives for his mistake?

Prabhakar Sawant a postman has a habit of reading letters before posting it to respective people.He comes across one such letter in the name of Madhav Mestri where his Murder has been planned,Prabhakar decides to save the victim and turn hero in life of his daughter Pari.Prabhakar goes to adjacent village to save Madhav Mestri but finds that there are three persons by the same name.A retired Doctor whose wife Malini is fed up with his strange behavior,A former Village Sarpanch whose a drunkard and his wife Saraswati is trying to stop his habit.And third being a newly married whose wife Hemlata is eager for an Honeymoon.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com

In Konkan village Prabhakar Sawant works as a postman and lives with his wife and daughter Pari,He has an habit of reading everyone's letters before delivering it to them.The villagers find that for years Prabahkar had not delivered their letters which are lying in his house and gets beaten up by them.Prabhakar tells them that he hide the letters as those letters would screw their happiness but villagers still feel that he was wrong on its part,Pari tells him not to do such work where he will get beaten up but do something great.Old habits die soon and Prabhakar reads a letter of a women from Sawantwadi whose written it to her lover Mahendra that she wants to kill her husband Madhav Mestri.Prabhakar decides to save the victim and travels to Sawant Wadi where he finds that there are three Madhav Mestri's in the village he gets confused as to which Madhav Mestri's wife wants to kill him and sends a letter to each one of them saying their wife wants to kill them.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
